00024   bool end_is(const char* begin, const char* ext) {
00025     const char* end = begin + strlen(begin);
00026     int ext_length = strlen(ext);
00027     if (ext_length > end - begin) {
00028       return false;
00029     } else {
00030       return (strcmp_case(end - ext_length, ext) == 0);
00031     }
00032   }

00035   ADR_EXPORT(const char*, AdrGetSupportedFileFormats)() {
00036     return
00037 #ifndef NO_MP3
00038       "MP3 Files:mp3"  ";"
00039 #endif
00040 #ifndef NO_OGG
00041       "Ogg Vorbis Files:ogg"  ";"
00042 #endif
00043 #ifndef NO_FLAC
00044       "FLAC Files:flac"  ";"
00045 #endif
00046 #ifndef NO_MIKMOD
00047       "Mod Files:mod,s3m,xm,it"  ";"
00048 #endif
00049       "WAV Files:wav";
00050   }

00053   template<typename T>
00054   static T* TryInputStream(File* file) {
00055 
00056     // initialize should never close the file
00057 
00058     T* source = new T();
00059     if (source->initialize(file)) {
00060       return source;
00061     } else {
00062       delete source;
00063       return 0;
00064     }
00065   }
00066

00074   SampleSource* OpenSource(File* raw_file, const char* filename) {
00075     ADR_GUARD("OpenSource");
00076 
00077     RefPtr<File> file(raw_file);
00078 
00079     #define TRY_SOURCE(source_type) {                                 \
00080       source_type* source = TryInputStream<source_type>(file.get());  \
00081       if (source) {                                                   \
00082         return source;                                                \
00083       } else {                                                        \
00084         file->seek(0, File::BEGIN);                                   \
00085       }                                                               \
00086     }
00087 
00088     // if filename is available, use it as a hint
00089     if (filename) {
00090       if (end_is(filename, ".wav")) {
00091 
00092         TRY_SOURCE(WAVInputStream);
00093 
00094 #ifndef NO_OGG
00095       } else if (end_is(filename, ".ogg")) {
00096 
00097         TRY_SOURCE(OGGInputStream);
00098 #endif
00099 #ifndef NO_MIKMOD
00100       } else if (end_is(filename, ".it") ||
00101           end_is(filename, ".xm") ||
00102           end_is(filename, ".s3m") ||
00103           end_is(filename, ".mod")) {
00104 
00105         TRY_SOURCE(MODInputStream);
00106 #endif
00107 #ifndef NO_MP3
00108       } else if (end_is(filename, ".mp3")) {
00109 
00110         TRY_SOURCE(MP3InputStream);
00111 #endif
00112 #ifndef NO_FLAC
00113       } else if (end_is(filename, ".flac")) {
00114 
00115         TRY_SOURCE(FLACInputStream);
00116 #endif
00117       }
00118     }
00119 
00120     // autodetect otherwise, in decreasing order of possibility of failure
00121 #ifndef NO_MIKMOD
00122     TRY_SOURCE(MODInputStream);
00123 #endif
00124     TRY_SOURCE(WAVInputStream);
00125 #ifndef NO_OGG
00126     TRY_SOURCE(OGGInputStream);
00127 #endif
00128 #ifndef NO_MP3
00129     TRY_SOURCE(MP3InputStream);
00130 #endif
00131 #ifndef NO_FLAC
00132     TRY_SOURCE(FLACInputStream);
00133 #endif
00134 
00135     return 0;
00136   }

00139   ADR_EXPORT(SampleSource*, AdrOpenSampleSource)(const char* filename) {
00140     if (!filename) {
00141       return 0;
00142     }
00143     File* file = OpenDefaultFile(filename);
00144     if (!file) {
00145       return 0;
00146     }
00147     return OpenSource(file, filename);
00148   }
00149 
00150 
00151   ADR_EXPORT(SampleSource*, AdrOpenSampleSourceFromFile)(File* file) {
00152     if (!file) {
00153       return 0;
00154     }
00155     return OpenSource(file, 0);
00156   }
